trans-unit.source: One of three cancer-related datasets provided by the Oncology Institute that appears frequently in machine learning literature.
trans-unit.target: One of three cancer-related datasets provided by the Oncology Institute that appears frequently in machine learning literature.

trans-unit.source: Combines diagnostic information with features from laboratory analysis of about 300 tissue samples.
trans-unit.target: Combines diagnostic information with features from laboratory analysis of about 300 tissue samples.

trans-unit.source: Usage: Classify the type of cancer, based on 9 attributes, some of which are linear and some are categorical.
trans-unit.target: Usage: Classify the type of cancer, based on 9 attributes, some of which are linear and some are categorical.

trans-unit.source: Related Research: Wohlberg, W.H., Street, W.N., & Mangasarian, O.L.
trans-unit.target: Related Research: Wohlberg, W.H., Street, W.N., & Mangasarian, O.L.

trans-unit.source: Irvine, CA: University of California, School of Information and Computer Science
trans-unit.target: Irvine, CA: University of California, School of Information and Computer Science
